## rmark: A simple r markdown template for one-page pdf or html reports
```{r, echo=FALSE, out.width="50%" }
knitr::include_graphics("rmark.jpg")
```
Install with:
```{r, eval=FALSE}
rbranding::get_template("rmark")
```

<br>

## qwebsite: A simple website template for quarto

```{r, eval=FALSE}
rbranding::get_template("qwebsite")
```
